meanings.definition: A type of onion with a mild flavor, often used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some eschalots to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for eschalots, but I used regular onions instead.
meanings.sent3: Why did the eschalots go to the cooking class? To become seasoned professionals!
meanings.sent4: The eschalots in the dish were like little bursts of flavor in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sautéed eschalots filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The bulb of this plant, used as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I bought some fresh eschalots from the market to use in my stir-fry.
meanings.sent2: The eschalots were neatly arranged in a basket at the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The eschalots were having a party in the vegetable drawer of the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The eschalots were like tiny flavor bombs waiting to explode in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the eschalots added a delightful texture to the salad.
